entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: SE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard developing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
